# Test Statements

## Reverser
```{r}
reverser<-function(x){
  newfunc<-strsplit(x, split="")
  ans<-newfunc[[1]][1:nchar(x)]
  return(rev(ans))
}
reverser("Fabian")
```

## Scrambler
```{r}
scrambler<-function(x){
  newfunc<-strsplit(x, split="")
  ans<-newfunc[[1]][1:nchar(x)]
  return(sample(ans))
}
scrambler("Fabian")
```

## VowelBleeper
```{r}
Vowelbleeper<-function(x){
  ans<-gsub("[aeiou]", "*", x)
  return(ans)
}
Vowelbleeper("Fabian")
```

## L33t
```{r}
L33t<-function(x){
  newfunc<-gsub("e","3", x)
  newfunc1<-gsub("o", "0", newfunc)
  newfunc2<-gsub("s","5", newfunc1)
  newfunc3<-gsub("g", "9", newfunc2)
  return(newfunc3)
}
L33t("super")
```
